    [Image] or [Truncated image[            Bcol      Ecol
L1
    [class]                                 1         6
    [MyClass]                               7         14
    [{]                                     15        16
L2
    [final]                                 3         8
    [stringWithBackslashes]                 9         30
    [=]                                     31        32
    ["Escaping\\ spaces\\ should work"]     33        64
L3
    [}]                                     1         2
EOF
